name: double-edge
effect: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
short_effect: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: A life-risking tackle that also hurts the user.
flavor_text.emerald: A life-risking tackle that also hurts the user.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: A reckless, life- risking tackle that also hurts the user a little.
